Amazing Experience

Villa is one of the most beautiful and relaxing places at the Mediterranean sea

DISCOVER

Get To Know Villa

Villa is an unique Bed & Breakfast tourism facility situated on the magnificent Mediterranean sea shores, prepared to welcome tranquility seeking tourists all year long. Click the images below to see more

Facilities

Everything You Need

Pool

Playground

Restaurant

Safari

Crystal Clear Turquoise Waters And Warm Beaches

There are 2 beautiful sunny beaches near Villa’s location conveniently equipped with beach chairs, umbrellas, beach bar, showers and trained life guards for your safety

SWIMMING SCHEDULE: 08:00 - 23:00

ROOMS

Comfort & Relaxation

All our rooms are equipped by default with the following amenities:

Air conditioning

Wifi

Private bathrooms

Widescreen LCD

Suite Room

High class luxury for the most demanding tourists. Features balcony and panorama

Premier Room

Get the best view to the beautiful sea and splendid surroundings at a moderate price

Delux

Our entry level room gives you access to all amenities at a really affordable price at villa.

TOURISM

Popular Attractions

JAMES CLARCK’S WHITE HOUSE:

Don't miss this great tourist attraction. The famous writer's house will fascinate literature enthusiasts and history aficionados

AEGEAN BELVEDERE:

The best place to watch the sunset in a romantic atmosphere and maybe even drink a glass of wine at one of the many bistros

NAVAGIO BEACH:

Is the most famous beach at the Mediterranean sea with white sands and cool beach bars. In the weekends take the train and avoid going by car

AFITOS OLD TOWN:

Full of historical importance for this part of the world, Afitos Old Towm will impress you with its charming caffes and familiar taverns
